text: Crazy Rich Asians is a 2018 Asian-American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Jon M. Chu. It is based on the 2013 novel of the same title by Kevin Kwan. The movie stars Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan, Lisa Lu, Awkwafina, Ken Jeong, and Michelle Yeoh. ==References== Category:2018 romantic comedy movies Category:2018 romantic drama movies Category:2018 comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies about motherâ€“son relationships Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jon M. Chu
title: Crazy Rich Asians (movie)
